H0.text: Chemical energy toasted the bread while the toaster, plugged into the outlet and turned on, converted electrical energy into other forms of energy.

H1.text: Heat is the form of energy that toasted the bread when Francis plugged the toaster into an electric outlet, put a piece of bread in the toaster, turned it on, and the toaster converted the electrical energy from the outlet into heat.

H2.text: Magnetic energy toasted the bread when Francis plugged the toaster into an electric outlet, inserts a piece of bread, and turns the toaster on, converting electrical energy from the outlet into other forms of energy.

H3.text: Sound is the form of energy that toasted the bread when Francis plugged a toaster into an electric outlet, placed a piece of bread inside, turned it on, and the toaster converted electrical energy from the outlet into other forms of energy.

A4.text: A toaster is a small electric appliance that uses radiant heat to cook sliced bread into toast.
